name: KARIMPUR ANAMI JATRA SAMAJ
briefDescription: Karimpur Anami Jatra Samaj is registered at Kolkata, West Bengal as a Social voluntary Organization registered under West Bengal Societies Registration Act 26, 1961 & registration No. - S/1L/93597. As mentioned above that although society was registered in 11/07/2012 but it has been carrying out its activities for the last several years in rural & urban areas of District- Nadia, Society was established with basic aim of providing social services to Poor Jatra, Theatre & folk artist.Karimpur Aanami jatra Samaj was established in the year 2007 and registered under the Societies of Registration act. 1961 West Bengal, in the year 2012,The organization was formed by a number of individuals from the Jatra culture and social work. From 2008, Karimpur Anami Jatra Samaj along with other activities decided to work in a very specific field, Since then it has been playing an important role in this area where very little social intervention has taken place. Working entirely on a voluntary basis, a great deal of ground has been covered till date. However, to make it a State wide issue needs sustained effort and involvement.
